citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:00 AM on
22-Mar-19.
Spoke with the licensee by phone. She was unable to leave work to conduct the inspection.
